mapper.select: select count(*) from bbs_t where status = 0 and bname=#{bname}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_t(subject, writer, content,file_name,ori_name,ip,write_date, hit,bname,status) values(#{subject}, #{writer}, #{content},#{fname},#{oname},#{ip},now(), 0,#{bname},0)
mapper.update: update bbs_t set hit=hit+1 where b_idx=#{idx}
